author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Securitas Agrees To Acquire Kratos Public Safety And Security Division
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - ‍Securitas Ab:
* AGREED TO ACQUIRE DIVISION KRATOS PUBLIC SAFETY AND SECURITY FROM KRATOS DEFENSE & SECURITY SOLUTIONS ​
* SECURITAS AGREES TO ACQUIRE KRATOS PUBLIC SAFETY AND SECURITY DIVISION
* ‍PURCHASE PRICE IS ABOUT MSEK 550 ON CASH AND DEBT-FREE BASIS​
* ‍ACQUISITION IS EXPECTED TO BE NEUTRAL TO SECURITAS EARNINGS PER SHARE IN 2018 AND 2019, AND ACCRETIVE AS OF 2020​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
